reviews.text: Great location, walking distance to everything. The hotel does not have an elevator. There was no mini fridge in our room. The room was nice and clean. Breakfast was included which was great, coffee, cold meats, eggs, sausages, etc.

I had the cheapest and single room under the roof, which was new style and okay. Downstairs the was an extended restaurant up to the river. Location is excellent and nor far than 500 m to enter historic city center. Excellent reception service. Breakfast wasn't great, but excitable.

Nice room but very poor breakfast.
Be careful with your wallet and money because I left with -100 euro from them. I left my wallet in the room and it was in my backpack, I didn’t check when I checked out to see if I have all the money and I notice it too late when I was out of the city. I called the hotel some random staff answered and when I told him the issue he suddenly forgot how to speak in English. Also we request to speak with the manager and he said to call another day and hangout. We called from
Another phone and apparently we spoke with the manager and all he could say was: you should look after your money and I know all my employees, they wouldn’t do this. He said that he will have a meeting with them the next day and he will revert with an answer but he never did….

Restaurant:
Impressive menu with explanation in English. Excellent dishes - all fresh cooked, no convenience ingridients noticeable.
Nice atmosphere in contemporary styled interior avoiding any kitsch missteps.
Discrete service.
Conclusion: travellers with minimum pretensions go there, not to the tourist hell nearby.

Great restaurant! Only a few minutes walk from the city center and a very different nd nice vibe. Very beautiful to sit outside, having an amazing view of the river. It has great charm! The food was good, the staff super warm and forthcoming. I would definetly come back!
